alert.note: Alert for Jones (South Dakota) Issued by the National Weather Service

info.senderName: NWS Aberdeen (Northern and Northeastern South Dakota)
info.headline: Severe Thunderstorm Warning issued May 30 at 9:10PM MDT until May 30 at 10:00PM MDT by NWS Aberdeen
info.description: The National Weather Service in Aberdeen has issued a * Severe Thunderstorm Warning for... Jones County in central South Dakota... * Until 1100 PM CDT. * At 1008 PM CDT, severe thunderstorms were located along a line extending from near Midland to near Okaton to White River, moving northeast at 40 mph. HAZARD...60 mph wind gusts. SOURCE...Radar indicated. At 959 PM CDT, a 63 mph wind gust was reported 7 miles east-northeast of Belvidere. IMPACT...Expect damage to roofs, siding, and trees. * Severe thunderstorms will be near... Murdo and Capa around 1020 PM CDT. Westover around 1025 PM CDT. Other locations in the path of these severe thunderstorms include Draper. HAIL THREAT...RADAR INDICATED MAX HAIL SIZE...<.75 IN WIND THREAT...OBSERVED MAX WIND GUST...60 MPH
info.instruction: For your protection move to an interior room on the lowest floor of a building. To report severe weather, contact your nearest law enforcement agency. They will send your report to the National Weather Service office in Aberdeen.
